name: The Quest (itch) (MasterReeses)
description:
Pridram the Necromancer has threatened to destroy the peaceful lands Ouyiu. The King has ordered the great hero Sir Kolfax (you) to find Pridram and end his reign of terror. 

You descend into a ravine that is rumored to house the lair of the Necromancer. No turning back now. However, the cave that he has hid himself in has been blocked off by an enchanted gate.

 Find a way through and bring peace to the land.
